definition[0]: the act of recording names and details on an official list
example[0]: Student registration  (=for a course of study) starts the first week in September.
definition[1]: an official piece of paper containing details about a motor vehicle and the name of its owner
example[3]: May I see your license and registration, ma'am?
definition[2]: in the US, the process of a company officially telling the SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION that it wishes to sell bonds, shares etc on a financial market, and getting its agreement to do this
example[5]: companies seeking SEC registration to sell securities to the public
